Interface_name: Http client-side based on Java.io & HttpURLConnection
Instruction:
Task Description: Create a Java class that implements an HTTP client using HttpURLConnection for making network requests, with support for request configuration, response handling, and optional GZIP compression.

Class Description: Networker is a singleton class that manages HTTP requests and responses. It uses a thread pool for asynchronous request execution and provides methods for configuring requests, handling responses, and managing connection settings.

Attributes:

sInstance: Networker - Singleton instance of the Networker class
sExecutor: Executor - Thread pool executor for handling requests asynchronously
READ_TIMEOUT_MS: int - Timeout for reading from connection (10000ms)
CONNECT_TIMEOUT_MS: int - Timeout for establishing connection (15000ms)
HEADER_ACCEPT_ENCODING: String - Header key for accept encoding ("Accept-Encoding")
GZIP_ENCODING: String - Value for GZIP encoding ("gzip")

Methods:

get(): void -> Networker - Returns the singleton instance of Networker
submit(HttpRequest request, Callback callback): void - Submits an HTTP request for asynchronous execution
HttpRequestTask(HttpRequest request, Callback callback): void - Constructor for the internal request task class
run(): void - Executes the HTTP request task
doFetch(): void -> HttpResponse - Performs the actual HTTP request and returns the response
configureAndConnectRequest(): void -> HttpURLConnection - Configures and connects the HTTP request
requestDecompression(HttpURLConnection conn): void - Sets the Accept-Encoding header for GZIP compression
applyDecompressionIfApplicable(HttpURLConnection conn, InputStream in): InputStream - Applies GZIP decompression if needed
copy(InputStream in, OutputStream out, byte[] buf): void - Copies data between streams
HttpRequest(Builder b): void - Constructor for HTTP request object
newBuilder(): void -> Builder - Creates a new HttpRequest builder
Builder(): void - Constructor for HttpRequest builder
friendlyName(String friendlyName): Builder -> Builder - Sets friendly name for request
method(HttpMethod method): Builder -> Builder - Sets HTTP method
url(String url): Builder -> Builder - Sets request URL
body(byte[] body): Builder -> Builder - Sets request body
build(): void -> HttpRequest - Builds the HttpRequest object
HttpResponse(int statusCode, byte[] body): void - Constructor for HTTP response object
onResponse(HttpResponse result): void - Callback for successful response
onFailure(IOException e): void - Callback for failed request
